QuestData.Title: Justice Rains from Above
QuestData.Description: Kill now, grieve later!$b$bHere, champion, take flight with one of my war eagles. Use the powers bestowed upon you by our united tribes and help us rain destruction down on these drogbar.$b$bLet us clog that new doorway to their lair with the bodies of their own!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bomb the forces of the Understone Breach
QuestData.CompletionText: The drogbar sure do love those rocks.
QuestData.RewardText: Well done. We will make a Skyhorn out of you yet.
